backend/main.mo: Defines a Product type, a static list of three products, and exposes query methods to fetch all products or a product by ID.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines a custom OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page assembling the hero, benefits, product cards, and detailed product sections using backend data and image assets.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product preview card with image, short details, benefit badges, and a Learn More button.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailsSe: Displays a full product detail section with image, benefits, and an expandable how‑to‑use accordion.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with brand logo and buttons that scroll to product sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance, refreshing it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context/provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch product lists and individual products via an actor from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background and text settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, radii, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and image asset needs for the SW PROFESSIONAL app.
